TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed FUNCFLAGS extends System.Enum

remarks.format: ## Remarks For additional information about `FUNCFLAGS`, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FBINDABLE = int16(4)

Docs.summary: The function that supports data binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FDEFAULTBIND = int16(32)

Docs.summary: The function that best represents the object. Only one function in a type information can have this attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FDEFAULTCOLLELEM = int16(256)

Docs.summary: Permits an optimization in which the compiler looks for a member named "xyz" on the type of "abc". If such a member is found, and is flagged as an accessor function for an element of the default collection, a call is generated to that member function. Permitted on members in dispinterfaces and interfaces; not permitted on modules.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FDISPLAYBIND = int16(16)

Docs.summary: The function that is displayed to the user as bindable. FUNCFLAG_FBINDABLE must also be set.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FHIDDEN = int16(64)

Docs.summary: The function should not be displayed to the user, although it exists and is bindable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FIMMEDIATEBIND = int16(4096)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FNONBROWSABLE = int16(1024)

Docs.summary: The property appears in an object browser, but not in a properties browser.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FREPLACEABLE = int16(2048)

Docs.summary: Tags the interface as having default behaviors.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FREQUESTEDIT = int16(8)

Docs.summary: When set, any call to a method that sets the property results first in a call to . The implementation of determines if the call is allowed to set the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FRESTRICTED = int16(1)

Docs.summary: The function should not be accessible from macro languages. This flag is intended for system-level functions or functions that type browsers should not display.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FSOURCE = int16(2)

Docs.summary: The function returns an object that is a source of events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FUIDEFAULT = int16(512)

Docs.summary: The type information member is the default member for display in the user interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCFLAGS FUNCFLAG_FUSESGETLASTERROR = int16(128)

Docs.summary: The function supports . If an error occurs during the function, the caller can call to retrieve the error code.
